title: Header
description: The basis for a JACS document

version.description: Version id of the object. uuid v4 string

selfSignature.description: Signature of of every field except this one and the hashing field by the creating/editing agent.

previousVersion.description: Previous Version id of the object. If blank, it's claiming to be the first

originalVersion.description: Original Version id of the object.

originalDate.description: Original creation date of the document.

sha256.description: Hash of every field except this one. During  updates and creation hash is the last thing to occur, as it includes the signature. Not immediatly required, but eventually required.

files.description: A set of files included with the jacs document
